typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as short,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as double,
		COMM as double,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> empSrc
empSrc split(DEPTNO==10,
	DEPTNO==20,
	DEPTNO==30,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitDepatwise@(dept10, dept20, dept30, deptOthers)
